sqlMap.select: select nvl(count(num),0) from board where $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%'

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select from board where $searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%' order by num desc) data)
where rnum>=#start# and rnum<=#end#
select num,name,subject,email,pwd,content,ipAddr, hitCount,created from board where num=#num#
select data.*from ( select num,subject from board where ($searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%') and (num>#num#) order by num asc) data where rownum=1

select data.*from ( select num,subject from board where ($searchKey$ like '%' || #searchValue# || '%')
and (num<#num#) order by num desc) data where rownum=1
sqlMap.update: update board set hitCount=hitCount+1 where num=#num#
update board set name=#name#,subject=#subject#,email=#email#, content=#content#,pwd=#pwd# where num=#num#
